name: raspdac_mini_lcd
description: Hardware configuration & display drivers for Audiophonics RaspDacMini LCD
author: Olivier Schwach, Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Display driver for Audiophonics RaspDacMini 2.4 inch LCD (ILI9341). Provides real-time playback information, album art, volume control, and metadata display with configurable screen timeout.
volumio_info.changelog: Initial release for Volumio 4.x - Node 20 compatible compositor with direct framebuffer rendering, native RGB565 conversion, and socket.io integration
